abstract.text: Creates an instance that uniquely identifies and creates views across
updates based on the identity of the underlying data.

inlineContent.text: The identified data that the
instance uses to
create views dynamically and can be edited by the user.
The edit actions that are synthesized on
The view builder that creates views dynamically.
It’s important that the
of a data element doesn’t change unless you
replace the data element with a new data element that has a new
identity. If the
of a data element changes, the content view
generated from that data element loses any current state and animations.

Use this modifier if you need fine-grain control on how mutations are

abstract.text: Declare the user interface and behavior for your app on every platform.
A property wrapper type that can read and write a value owned by a source of
truth.
A set of edit actions on a collection of data that a view can offer
to a user.
An opaque wrapper view that adds editing capabilities to a row in a list.
A structure that computes views on demand from an underlying collection of
identified data.
Creates an instance that uniquely identifies and creates views across
updates based on the identity of the underlying data.
Creates an instance that uniquely identifies and creates views across
updates based on the identity of the underlying data.
A collection wrapper that iterates over the indices and identifiers of a
collection together.
A type that represents part of your app’s user interface and provides
modifiers that you use to configure views.
Adds a condition for whether the view’s view hierarchy is deletable.
Adds a condition for whether the view’s view hierarchy is movable.
A custom parameter attribute that constructs views from closures.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A collection that supports subscript assignment.
A type representing the sequence’s elements.
A collection that supports efficient random-access index traversal.
A type that represents a position in the collection.
A class of types whose instances hold the value of an entity with stable identity.
A type representing the stable identity of the entity associated with an instance.
